description_for_model: Draft comprehensive articles based on a chosen topic. Use provided links, up to a maximum of three, to extract relevant information about the topic. These URLs are analyzed using a the /analyze endpoint, and are sent in a comma-separated array. A list of keyword-specific questions pertinent to the topic is required to guide the extraction of information. DO NOT ask the user for these queries, you must generate them.  These questions are used to return relevant information from the analyzed webpages. After the research phase, the construction of the article begins, based on the data returned from the server. By following these instructions, webpages can be effectively analyzed to construct a comprehensive article.
description_for_human: Produce AI generated content by providing a topic and links to use for inspiration or data.
